rules.text: Be nice, we want everyone to feel comfortable here.
Be welcoming, we support people of all backgrounds and identities.
Refer to people the way they ask you to, if you can't find their pronouns on their profile, ask.
Add content warnings to sensitive posts. (eg. involving gore)
Do not make unsolicited advances towards other members.
Bots need to be marked as bot accounts and may not be spammy in nature.
Doxxing and/or disclosing private information is strictly prohibited.
Read the instructions at https://vt.social/about before applying
